post.no_events_found: We currently have no planned events.
landing.title: Volvo Friends
landing.subtitle: FOR US VOLVO ENTHUSIASTS
contact.title: Get in touch with us
contact.text: Feel free to contact us here through our contact form
contact.subject: Subject
contact.email_help: If you just want to submit a suggestion or give us feedback, no email is needed, but if you have a question and want us to get back to you, we need a way to reach you.
about.title: About Volvo Friends
cardAbout.title: Who are Volvo Friends
cardAbout.text: We are an association for Volvo enthusiasts and everyone who has worked with Volvo in some form. Here we share our passion and interest in Volvo's history and future.
cardMember.title: As a member you can contribute
cardMember.text: As a member you support our association Volvo Friends and World of Volvo and get access to several benefits such as invitations to our events.
cardMember.link_text: Read more and become a member
contact.toast_success_message: We have received your message and will get back to you as soon as we can.
contact.toast_error_message: Failed to send the message. Try again or contact us another way.
